summary: The Finish the Arkansas Valley Conduit Act (S. 296) amends Public Law 87–590 concerning the Arkansas Valley Conduit in Colorado. The bill modifies repayment terms, specifically related to the source and interest on funding. It specifies that repayment will be interest-free and consist of funds provided during construction, excluding those from the Secretary, and will be spread over a 100-year period. The bill aims to facilitate the completion of this infrastructure project.
